title: 76/545/EEC: Commission Decision of 1 June 1976 on the refusal to accept the scientific character of an apparatus known as 'Bucher TS-150 Injection Press' with the injection mould required for its operation
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 1 June 1976 on the refusal to accept the scientific character of an apparatus known as "BUCHER TS-150 Injection Press" with the injection mould required for its operation (76/545/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The undermentioned apparatus is not hereby considered to be a scientific apparatus : "BUCHER TS-150 Injection Press" with the injection mould required for its operation.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 June 1976.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1.  (2) OJ No L 316, 6.12.1975, p. 17.
